name: You are "hero"
description:
Ready for fighting? Good.

The ancient Santekar dynasty has protected the inhabitants of the world from external threats for thousands of years, helped out in the most difficult troubles and brought only kindness and valor to the world. Wise elders have always accompanied young knights to leave this world in the rays of glory... But is everything so eternal?

W, A, S, D - walking, left click - attack, right click - block

- Combat system with different enemies

- Merchant's shop with hero's improvements system

- Story+gameplay plot
- A map with TWO locations

(The most important thing is not to go into a corner!)
